title: Posterrama Configuration
description: Schema for the Posterrama config.json file.

syncEnabled.description: Enable synchronized transitions across devices. When false, each device advances independently.

syncAlignMaxDelayMs.description: Maximum milliseconds before a sync boundary at which clients will realign to the global tick.

transitionIntervalSeconds.description: How many seconds each poster is visible.

backgroundRefreshMinutes.description: How often (in minutes) the entire media library is re-fetched. 0 to disable.

showRottenTomatoes.description: Shows a 'Fresh' or 'Rotten' badge on the poster.

rottenTomatoesMinimumScore.description: Minimum score (0-10 scale) required for inclusion when Rotten Tomatoes data is available. Set to 0 to disable.

showMetadata.description: Shows metadata (title, tagline, etc.). Requires 'showPoster' to be enabled.

clockWidget.description: Shows a clock in the top left of the screen.

clockTimezone.description: Timezone for the clock widget (IANA timezone identifier like 'Europe/Amsterdam', 'America/New_York'). Defaults to system timezone.

clockFormat.description: Clock display format: '12h' for 12-hour format with AM/PM, '24h' for 24-hour format.

screensaverMode.description: Screensaver mode settings - displays single poster with metadata and effects

orientation.description: Screensaver orientation (auto = follow device/aspect ratio, or force specific orientation)

wallartMode.description: Enable wallart mode - displays multiple posters/covers in a grid layout. Shows many items simultaneously like a digital art gallery.

density.description: Grid density preset that influences number of rows/columns

randomness.description: Amount of random staggering in the cycle timing

orientation.description: Wallart orientation (auto = follow device/aspect ratio, or force specific orientation)

animationType.description: Animation style used for grid updates

layoutVariant.description: Wallart layout variant - heroGrid recommended for modern look, filmCards for elegant card-based display

ambientGradient.description: Enable subtle ambient gradient background overlay

heroSide.description: Position of the hero poster - left or right side of the grid

heroRotationMinutes.description: How often (in minutes) to rotate the hero poster

biasAmbientToHero.description: Weight ambient gradient sampling more toward the hero image

groupBy.description: Group films by: director, genre, actor, collection (Plex collections like 'James Bond Collection'), or random (picks random group type each session)

cardRotationSeconds.description: How often to rotate to next group (seconds)

posterRotationSeconds.description: How often posters rotate within group (seconds)

minGroupSize.description: Minimum films required per group to display

accentColor.description: Accent color for the cinematic filter effect (hex color code)

gamesOnly.description: Show only game covers from RomM sources (requires RomM to be enabled and configured)

parallaxDepth.description: Parallax scrolling depth settings (only applies when animationType is 'parallaxDepth')

speed.description: Parallax intensity multiplier (1.0 = normal, higher = more pronounced depth)

depthScale.description: Scale factor for foreground layers to create depth perception

smoothScroll.description: Enable smooth scroll interpolation for smoother motion

perspective.description: CSS 3D perspective value in pixels (affects depth perception)

musicMode.description: Configuration for Wallart Music Mode - displays album covers in square grid layouts

enabled.description: Enable Music Mode - shows only album covers (cannot be combined with gamesOnly)

displayStyle.description: Display style: covers-only (minimal), album-info (with metadata), artist-cards (artist-focused)

density.description: Grid density for music mode (affects number of albums shown)

gridSize.description: Grid size for album layout (square grids only)

layout.description: Layout type: grid (uniform) or hero-grid (1 large + 16 small)

artistRotationSeconds.description: Seconds between artist rotations (artist-cards style only)

albumRotationSeconds.description: Seconds between album cover rotations within artist cards (artist-cards style only)

minRating.description: Minimum rating filter for music albums (0-10 scale)

sortWeights.description: Weights for weighted-random sorting (only applies when sortMode is weighted-random)

accentColor.description: Accent color for artist cards overlay (Deep Blue default)

cinemaMode.description: Enable cinema mode for portrait displays with fullscreen poster layout.

cinemaOrientation.description: Screen orientation for cinema mode displays.

cinema.description: Cinema mode overlays and presentation settings (header/footer, marquee, specs, ambilight).

globalEffects.description: Global visual effects applied to the entire cinema display

colorFilter.description: Global color filter applied to poster and background

tintColor.description: Custom tint color when colorFilter is 'tint'

text.description: Text to display in cinema header

tonSurTon.description: Auto-calculate elegant text color based on background

type.description: Footer type - marquee scrolling text, metadata/specs display, or movie tagline

typography.description: Footer typography settings (for marquee and tagline types)

tonSurTon.description: Auto-calculate elegant text color based on background

enabled.description: Enable Now Playing integration - show posters from active Plex sessions

priority.description: Session selection priority (first = first active session, random = random active session, user = specific user)

filterUser.description: When priority is 'user', only show sessions from this Plex username

fallbackToRotation.description: Always fall back to normal rotation when no active sessions (fixed behavior)

updateIntervalSeconds.description: How often to check for session updates (5-300 seconds)

rotationIntervalMinutes.description: Poster/stream rotation interval in minutes. Supports decimals (0.5 = 30 seconds). 0 = disabled. Also used for multi-stream Now Playing rotation.

style.description: Poster display style: fullBleed (edge to edge), framed (with border), floating (with shadow), polaroid (white frame with bottom caption area), shadowBox (deep 3D shadow), neon (glowing border), doubleBorder (two-line frame), ornate (decorative corners)

overlay.description: Overlay effect applied to the poster

frameWidth.description: Frame width in pixels when style is 'framed'

mode.description: Background mode: solid (black), blurred (poster blur), gradient (dynamic), ambient (color extraction), spotlight (theater spotlight), starfield (animated stars), curtain (theater drapes)

position.description: Metadata position: bottom (under poster), overlay (on poster)

showAudio.description: Display audio format (e.g., Dolby Atmos, DTS)

showHDR.description: Display HDR format (HDR10, Dolby Vision, etc.)

style.description: Specs display style: dark-glass (text only, dark), glass (text only, light), icons-only (icons without text), icons-text (icons with text)

iconSet.description: Icon style: tabler (Tabler Icons), material (Material Symbols)

promotional.description: Promotional overlay features for commercial use

showWatchProviders.description: Show streaming services/watch providers where available

showAwardsBadge.description: Show awards badge for award-winning content

url.description: URL to encode in QR code (leave empty for auto trailer link)

orientation.description: Cinema mode orientation (auto = portrait, or force specific orientation)

quickTheme.description: Selected quick theme preset (classicCinema, noir, neonNights, vintageTheater, modernMinimal, filmProjector)

transitionEffect.description: Visual transition effect for background images and posters. Duration is automatically calculated based on transition interval.

effectPauseTime.description: Time to pause after effect completes before next transition in seconds (not applied to Ken Burns effect).

uiScaling.description: Scaling settings for UI elements to adapt to different screen sizes and resolutions.

content.description: Poster and metadata content size scaling percentage (50-200%)

global.description: Global scaling multiplier for all UI elements (50-200%)

mediaServers.description: An array of media server configurations.

name.description: A friendly name for this server.

type.description: The type of the media server.

enabled.description: Whether this server configuration is active.

hostname.description: Direct hostname or IP. Mandatory for enabled servers.

port.description: Direct TCP port. Mandatory for enabled servers.

tokenEnvVar.description: Environment variable containing the authentication token (token itself stays out of config.json).

token.description: Optional direct token/API key (NOT recommended  prefer tokenEnvVar).

musicLibraryNames.description: List of Plex music library names to include for Music Mode (Plex only).

musicFilters.description: Filtering options for music content (Plex only).

genres.description: List of allowed music genres (empty = all genres).

artists.description: List of specific artists to include (empty = all artists).

recentlyAddedDays.description: Number of days to consider as 'recently added'.

yearFilter.description: Release year filter: number (>=) or comma-separated years/ranges like '2010, 2015-2020'.

genreFilter.description: Comma-separated list of allowed genres for filtering content.

url.description: Full URL for RomM server (for type=romm only). Example: http://romm-server:8080

username.description: Username for RomM authentication (for type=romm only).

password.description: Password for RomM authentication (for type=romm only). Use passwordEnvVar for environment variable reference.

passwordEnvVar.description: Environment variable name containing RomM password (for type=romm only). Alternative to password field.

selectedPlatforms.description: List of platform slugs to include (for type=romm only). Empty = all platforms.

insecureHttps.description: Allow self-signed or invalid HTTPS certificates (for type=romm only).

siteServer.description: Configuration for the optional public-facing site server.

enabled.description: Enable promotional site server on separate port

deviceMgmt.description: Feature flag for device management UI and APIs.

bypass.description: Optional bypass configuration. When a client IP matches ipAllowList, the frontend will skip device management (no registration, no heartbeats, no websocket). Useful for kiosk screens or trusted internal dashboards.

ipAllowList.description: Array of IP addresses or CIDR ranges (IPv4/IPv6) that should bypass device management.

clientDebugViewer.description: Client-side debug viewer for live troubleshooting on display devices

enabled.description: Enable semi-transparent debug log viewer overlay on screensaver, wallart, and cinema modes

mqtt.description: MQTT integration for Home Assistant and other automation platforms

password.description: MQTT password (direct, less secure than passwordEnvVar)

externalUrl.description: External URL for Home Assistant to access Posterrama (e.g., http://192.168.1.100:4000). If not set, uses baseUrl from main config.

timeout.description: Seconds after last heartbeat to mark device offline

enabled.description: Enable TMDB as a media source

category.description: TMDB category to fetch (popular, top_rated, now_playing, upcoming)

genreFilter.description: Comma-separated genre IDs to filter by

streamingSources.description: List of additional streaming sources (reserved for future use).

serverName.description: Friendly name for this Posterrama instance.

baseUrl.description: Base URL where this instance is reachable (for links/tooling).

port.description: Optional explicit port override for integrations/tests.

plexClientOptions.description: Advanced options to pass to the plex-api client.

serverPort.description: The port that the server listens on for HTTP connections.

backups.description: Configuration for automated backups of configuration files.

time.description: Time of day to run backups in HH:MM format (24-hour).

retention.description: Number of backup sets to retain (1-60).

retentionDays.description: Maximum age of backups in days (0-365). Backups older than this are deleted regardless of retention count. 0 = disabled (only count-based cleanup).

rootRoute.description: Behavior for the entry route '/': landing page or redirect to a default mode.

behavior.description: How '/' should behave: 'landing' serves index.html, 'redirect' issues a temporary redirect.

defaultMode.description: Target mode for redirect when behavior is 'redirect'. Optional; if omitted, the active Display Settings mode will be used.

statusCode.description: HTTP status code to use for redirect (temporary only).

bypassParam.description: Query parameter name that, when present, forces landing (useful for admin/dev).

testKeyConfig.description: Test configuration key (for testing purposes only)

someInt.description: Test integer value (for testing purposes only)

localDirectory.description: Local directory support for managing poster collections and generating posterpacks. Accepts legacy configuration properties for backwards compatibility.

enabled.description: Enable local directory as a media source.

rootPath.description: Root path for local media directory. Must be an absolute path.

watchDirectories.description: Additional absolute directories to scan/watch as local media roots (same expected subfolders as rootPath).

posterpackGeneration.description: Configuration for automatic posterpack generation from Plex/Jellyfin. Accepts legacy configuration properties for backwards compatibility.

itemConcurrency.description: Maximum number of media items to process in parallel.

assetConcurrency.description: Maximum number of assets (posters, backgrounds, etc.) to download in parallel per item.

maxInflightDownloads.description: Maximum total number of simultaneous asset downloads across all items.

retryMaxRetries.description: Maximum number of retry attempts for failed downloads.

retryBaseDelay.description: Base delay in milliseconds between retry attempts (uses exponential backoff).

previewOrientation.description: Default orientation for preview mode (landscape or portrait)

dashboardCards.description: Selected dashboard cards for the admin panel overview page
